channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Court rules that OpenAI violated German copyright law; ordered it to pay damages
item.description: A German court ruled that OpenAI’s ChatGPT violated the nation’s copyright laws by training its language models on licensed musical work without permission.

item.title: Steam Machine : Valve lance une console de salon
item.description: Après des mois, voire des années, de rumeurs et autres fuites, Valve a fini par lever le voile sur non pas une nouveauté matérielle, mais… trois ! Parmi lesquelles un appareil qui pourrait bien faire des ravages dans les salons.

item.title: This Is What a Star Looks Like Just 26 Hours After It Explodes
item.description: Astronomers have captured a supernova in its earliest stages—and the aftermath is unexpectedly olive-shaped.

item.title: China Accuses United States of $13 Billion Bitcoin Mining Pool Hack
item.description: Some in the crypto community are skeptical.

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude Takes Control of a Robot Dog
item.description: Anthropic believes AI models will increasingly reach into the physical world. To understand where things are headed, it asked Claude to program a quadruped.

item.title: OpenAI says the brand-new GPT-5.1 is ‘warmer’ and has more ‘personality’ options
item.description: OpenAI is releasing GPT-5.1 today, an update to the flagship model it released in August. OpenAI calls it an “upgrade” to GPT-5 that “makes ChatGPT smarter and more enjoyable to talk to.” The new models include GPT-5.1 Instant and GPT-5.1 Thinking. The former is “warmer, more intelligent, and better at following your instructions” than its […]

item.title: Valve is welcoming Android games into Steam
item.description: You can think of the just-announced Steam Frame as a wireless VR headset for your PC, or a Steam Deck for your face. But another way to think about it is that Valve is finally entering the mobile realm. The Frame doesn’t just run Windows games on its Arm-based Qualcomm Snapdragon chip — Valve will […]

item.title: LG fait du XXL avec cet écran OLED incurvé de 45 pouces en promo à -600 € pendant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Directement sur le site de LG il y a des offres qui entrent dans le cadre du pré-Black Friday avec le moniteur LG 45GX900A-B à 1 098,99 euros au lieu de 1 699,99 euros.

item.title: Steam Frame officialisé : voici le casque VR de Valve qui veut rendre obsolète votre Meta Quest
item.description: Valve débarque enfin sur le marché de la VR standalone (sans le PC) avec une promesse : jouer à toute votre bibliothèque Steam sans fil. Mais derrière l'enthousiasme, il y a quelques compromis qui risquent de faire grincer des dents.

item.title: Steam Frame vs Meta Quest 3: Valve's VR headset swings at the king, but we're missing one key detail
item.description: Valve's new Steam Frame headset is here to take on the Meta Quest 3, but which one should you buy? Here's how the two VR titans compare.

item.title: Valve’s New Steam Machine Could Disrupt Console Gaming as We Know It
item.description: It's not a "GameCube" per se, but Valve's Steam Machine will bring your Steam library to your living room.

item.title: Steam Machine vs Steam Deck: the 4 biggest differences explained
item.description: Valve has just surprised us all with its new gaming Steam Machine, but how exactly does it fare against the Steam Deck?

item.title: iOS 26.2 beta adds new Liquid Glass customization, alarms in the Reminders app, and more
item.description: Apple released the iOS 26.2 beta 1 last week, introducing the option to adjust the Liquid Glass appearance of the lock screen clock, and more.

item.title: Valve has stopped manufacturing its Index VR headset
item.description: Valve has just announced the Steam Frame, its new VR headset that can play games streamed directly from your PC using a dedicated streaming stick and run Windows games locally thanks to an Arm chip in the headset itself. At the same time, Valve is also moving on from its previous VR headset, the Valve […]

item.title: Valve annonce une Steam Machine et relance la guerre des consoles : un cube pour défier PlayStation et Xbox
item.description: Valve ressort une vieille idée ratée, mais cette fois avec une arme secrète : une décennie d'apprentissage douloureux. La Steam Machine 2025 pourrait réussir là où son ancêtre a lamentablement échoué.

item.title: Valve has just unveiled a weird new Steam controller, and it seems like a massive upgrade compared to its predecessor
item.description: Valve has just unveiled a new controller.

item.title: Steam Frame official – 7 things you need to know about Valve's Quest 3 rival
item.description: Valve has officially revealed its long-awaited Steam Frame headset – here's everything you need to know about the Meta Quest 3 rival.

item.title: How ‘Paranormal Activity’ Is Making the Jump (Scare) from Screen to Stage
item.description: io9 spoke with Levi Holloway, the writer of the new stage production of the Blumhouse horror franchise.

item.title: Valve has no news about Steam Deck 2
item.description: Valve has just announced its biggest hardware push that it’s arguably ever made — a living room game console called the Steam Machine, a headset called the Steam Frame, and the long-awaited sequel to its Steam Controller it hinted about three years back. But Valve won’t say the first word about its next gaming handheld, […]

item.title: Valve has just revealed a new Steam Machine, and it sounds like a beefed-up Steam Deck for your TV
item.description: Valve has just announced a new Steam Machine system.

item.title: Microsoft’s Windows president says Windows is becoming an ‘agentic OS,’ and the internet is having none of it
item.description: The internet was upset with Microsoft's plans to shove more AI into Windows.

item.title: Pico 4 Ultra : le casque VR rival du Meta Quest 3 s’immerge dans le Singles Day avec 260 € de réduction
item.description: Un casque VR premium sous la barre des 350 euros ? C’est le Pico 4 Ultra qui profite du Singles Day pour afficher son prix à 339 euros au lieu de 599 euros sur AliExpress.

item.title: We tried Valve’s new VR headset, PC, and controller — ask us anything!
item.description: Hi! I'm Jay Peters, a senior reporter here at The Verge. I'm perhaps the site's second-biggest Steam Deck fan, surpassed only by Sean Hollister, our unofficial handheld gaming PC reviewer. So you can imagine how excited we were to visit Valve's headquarters to try the company's three new hardware products: the Steam Frame, a streaming-focused […]

item.title: Valve’s new Steam Controller might be my dream controller
item.description: One of the best parts of the Steam Deck is its many different controls, and how you can customize them to let you do whatever you want with every single one of your games. Now, Valve is bringing that same level of flexibility into a new gamepad. I recently got to try it at Valve's […]

item.title: The Steam Frame is a surprising new twist on VR
item.description: Valve is about to launch a new virtual reality headset, and with it, a comprehensive new approach to what a VR device should be. Most VR headsets I've tried have ended up collecting dust after the novelty wore off, and I thought I had sworn off VR for good. But after trying Valve's new headset […]

item.title: Our first look at the Steam Machine, Valve’s ambitious new game console
item.description: Valve is about to challenge the Xbox and PlayStation on their home turf. Ten years to the month after Valve's original Steam Machines went on sale, the company is announcing… the Steam Machine. I flew to Valve's headquarters to try the company's new PC-based game console, alongside a brand-new Steam Controller and the new Steam […]

item.title: Valve enters the console wars
item.description: On the 15th floor of an upscale office building in Bellevue, Washington, security guards line the halls. They're here to make sure we don't stray - because I'm visiting Valve's headquarters, a place few journalists ever get to go. The guards help escort me to a tiny demo room, where a pair of Valve engineers […]

item.title: Steam Machines have returned: all the news about Valve’s new hardware universe
item.description: In 2012, The Verge broke the news that Valve was making a game console. Gabe Newell himself dished on the company’s grand plans. By 2015, the “Steam Machines” had utterly flopped. But Valve never stopped quietly working on the idea. The Steam Deck handheld became the seed for a grand reboot of Valve’s console and […]

item.title: Your next STI test could come from DoorDash
item.description: Visby Medical’s new at-home PCR test for women delivers results in 30 minutes—and can arrive the same day via GoPuff or DoorDash. The worst part of any medical is waiting for results. That can be especially true of sexual health tests. Those conducted in person can take 24–48 hours, but if they’re submitted via at-home collection kit and mailed to a lab, it can take even longer. ...

item.title: Amazons top-of-the-line 55-inch Mini LED Fire TV is at its best price ever pre-Black Friday
item.description: Amazon's 55-inch Omni Mini-LED QLED 4K TV is down to a new best price ever ahead of Black Friday. Get it for just $694.99 and save 15%.

item.title: Nostalgique de la première Xbox ? Backbone lance une manette Pro translucide
item.description: Backbone, lance la Backbone Pro Xbox Edition. Reprenant les atouts du modèle Pro, cette édition se distingue par un design vert translucide inspiré de la première Xbox et l'intégration des boutons officiels de la marque.

item.title: Cyber Monday deals 2025: when they start, what to expect, and our expert buying tips
item.description: Cyber Monday 2025 is quickly approaching - should you wait? Here's everything you need to know about this huge sale.

item.title: Ring video doorbells are half price in Amazon's early Black Friday sale, so why wait?
item.description: Boost your home security for less with massive savings on Ring doorbells and home security cameras.

item.title: Amazon's early Black Friday sale is filled with best-selling tech gadgets – here are 35 deals I'd buy from $9
item.description: Amazon's early Black Friday sale is live, and I'm rounding up today's 35 best tech gadgets, including smart home devices, AirPods, tablets, and TVs, starting at just $9.

item.title: These Anti-Meta Smart Glasses Are Controlled by a Health-Tracking Smart Ring
item.description: The new Even Realities Even G2 smart glasses don't have speakers or a camera, but do come with smart ring.

item.title: The sock-grabbing Roborock Saros Z70 is $600 off at Amazon before Black Friday
item.description: The Roborock Saros Z70 is on sale at Amazon for $1,999.99, down from the normal price of $2,599. That's a 23% discount.

item.title: Watch The Devil Wears Prada 2 trailer to see Meryl Streep and Anne Hathaway together again
item.description: Watch this teaser for "The Devil Wears Prada 2" to see Meryl Streep and Anne Hathaway together again.

item.title: Test du Hisense HT Saturn : et si le vrai home-cinéma sans fil ne venait pas de Sony ni de Samsung ?
item.description: Avec son architecture quadriphonique et sa configuration sans fil, le Hisense HT Saturn promet une immersion sonore à 360 degrés dans une formule compacte et ultra simple à installer. Misant sur la collaboration avec Devialet pour le réglage acoustique, ce système 4.1.2 veut proposer des effets Atmos spectaculaires, le tout à un prix maîtrisé. En voici notre test complet. ...

item.title: La montre OnePlus Watch 3, avec ses 5 jours d’autonomie, est 200 € moins chère à l’occasion du Singles Day
item.description: OnePlus remet les pendules à l’heure avec une nouvelle mouture de sa montre connectée. Après une Watch 2 déjà solide, la marque chinoise affine son approche avec une couronne rotative bien pensée, et un écran plus large. Les Singles Day font tomber son prix de 349 euros à 151,46 euros sur AliExpress.

item.title: That Black Hole Merger That ‘Shouldn’t’ Exist’? Scientists Propose a Wild Explanation
item.description: The black hole was bigger than expected, and while the answer was hiding in plain sight, it still rewrites what we thought was possible.

item.title: Hollywood Is Closing the Book on ‘Jumanji’ (Again)
item.description: Dwayne Johnson announced that his third 'Jumanji' film—the fourth overall in the franchise—will be the last.

item.title: After DARPA list shakes up quantum computing world, IBM has a message: We’re doing great
item.description: Not to be outdone by the recently named most-viable quantum companies, IBM says it’s accelerating through its road map with two new processors. With all the news in the quantum world this month—including DARPA’s new list of the most viable quantum companies, and Quantinuum’s announcement of “the most accurate quantum computer in the world“—IBM, not to be outdone, put out a statement of its own. The top-line message: We’re doing great!...

item.title: This 1 small habit makes you instantly likable, according to a Yale expert
item.description: You can do it in just a few minutes a day. What makes some people instantly likable? How can you make people want to be around you, to work with you, and follow your leadership? You may think it comes down to charisma that some people have and others don’t. In fact, there’s a simple habit that will make you instantly more likable. It’s the secret behind “magnetism,” according to Emma Seppälä, lecturer at the Yale School of Management and author of The Happiness Track. In a piece for Psychology Today, she cites research showing that “positive practices“—small moments of gratitude and caring tow...
